comment.author: 61289374@N05
comment._content: Once more, thanks staff at SDASM for the plethora of Golden Age subjects. A wonderful time, only marred by the completely annoying "new" Flickr, which is a nightmare for the users. I pass along the links to this postings to aviation friends that become so aggravated by how slow, glitchy and ill-designed Flickr is through a wide spectrum of computers and OS, that they just drop it without been able to enjoy these incredible collections.
